languages.text: {n}Мастер Печатей с недоверием смотрит на Джай поверх золотых окуляров. Затем переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Как понимаю, вы — ее поручитель? В таком случае от вас потребуется заявление в письменном виде по шаблону №404.01. А также письменное согласие на обработку и заверение персональных данных вашего святейшего лица. В противном случае я не смогу выдать госпоже..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Мастер Печатей с недоверием смотрит на Джай поверх золотых окуляров. Затем переводит взгляд на вас.{/n} "Как понимаю, вы — ее поручитель? В таком случае от вас потребуется заявление в письменном виде по шаблону №404.01. А также письменное согласие на обработку и заверение персональных данных вашего святейшего лица. В противном случае я не смогу выдать госпоже..."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}The Master of Seals peers over her ocular lenses at Jae in disbelief. Then she looks at you.{/n} "I take it you are her sponsor? In that case, you must submit a written application in conformity with template #404.01. As well as written permission for the processing and notarisation of the personal data of your most sacred personage. Without it, I cannot issue Mistress..."

В противном случае я не смогу выдать госпоже..."

languages.text: {n}印章大师透过目镜，以怀疑的眼神盯着婕伊，之后看着你。{/n}“我可以认为你是她的赞助人吗？如果是这种情况，你必须提交一份符合404.01号模板的书面申请，以及经过公证处理的书面许可，证明你最神圣的个人身份。如果没有这些材料，恐怕我没办法向这位……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers over her ocular lenses at Jae in disbelief. Then she looks at you.{/n} "I take it you are her sponsor? In that case, you must submit a written application in conformity with template #404.01. As well as written permission for the processing and notarisation of the personal data of your most sacred personage. Without it, I cannot issue Mistress..."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章大师透过目镜，以怀疑的眼神盯着婕伊，之后看着你。{/n}“我可以认为你是她的赞助人吗？如果是这种情况，你必须提交一份符合404.01号模板的书面申请，以及经过公证处理的书面许可，证明你最神圣的个人身份。如果没有这些材料，恐怕我没办法向这位……”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}La Maestra de Sellos mira a Jae con sus lentes oculares como si no creyera lo que oye. Después te mira.{/n} «¿Puedo suponer que usted ejerce de garante? En ese caso, necesitaré una solicitud por escrito conforme a la plantilla 404.01, además de permiso por escrito para el procesado y la notarización de los datos personales de su sagrada persona. Sin ello, no podré otorgar a la señora...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers over her ocular lenses at Jae in disbelief. Then she looks at you.{/n} "I take it you are her sponsor? In that case, you must submit a written application in conformity with template #404.01. As well as written permission for the processing and notarisation of the personal data of your most sacred personage. Without it, I cannot issue Mistress..."

En ese caso, necesitaré una solicitud por escrito conforme a la plantilla 404.01, además de permiso por escrito para el procesado y la notarización de los datos personales de su sagrada persona. Sin ello, no podré otorgar a la señora...».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}印章長はいぶかしげな眼差しで眼鏡越しにジェイを見つめる。{/n}「陛下がこの者の身元引受人でよろしいのですか？でしたら、様式#404.01に基づいた申請書を提出してください。陛下の最重要人物個人情報の処理許可書及び公証書もご用意ください。それが無いことには手続きができませんので、ええと…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers over her ocular lenses at Jae in disbelief. Then she looks at you.{/n} "I take it you are her sponsor? In that case, you must submit a written application in conformity with template #404.01. As well as written permission for the processing and notarisation of the personal data of your most sacred personage. Without it, I cannot issue Mistress..."

traits.locale_text: {n}印章長はいぶかしげな眼差しで眼鏡越しにジェイを見つめる。{/n}「陛下がこの者の身元引受人でよろしいのですか？でしたら、様式#404.01に基づいた申請書を提出してください。陛下の最重要人物個人情報の処理許可書及び公証書もご用意ください。それが無いことには手続きができませんので、ええと…」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}La maîtresse des sceaux jette un regard incrédule à Jae par-dessus ses lorgnons mécaniques, puis elle se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Je présume que vous êtes {mf|son|sa} mécène ? Dans ce cas, vous devez présenter une demande écrite conforme au modèle 404.01, ainsi qu'un formulaire de consentement au traitement et à l'enregistrement des données relatives à votre sacro-sainte personne. Sans cela, je ne peux pas remettre à maîtresse... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers over her ocular lenses at Jae in disbelief. Then she looks at you.{/n} "I take it you are her sponsor? In that case, you must submit a written application in conformity with template #404.01. As well as written permission for the processing and notarisation of the personal data of your most sacred personage. Without it, I cannot issue Mistress..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La maîtresse des sceaux jette un regard incrédule à Jae par-dessus ses lorgnons mécaniques, puis elle se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Je présume que vous êtes {mf|son|sa} mécène ? Dans ce cas, vous devez présenter une demande écrite conforme au modèle 404.01, ainsi qu'un formulaire de consentement au traitement et à l'enregistrement des données relatives à votre sacro-sainte personne. Sans cela, je ne peux pas remettre à maîtresse... »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel blickt über ihre Linsen hinweg ungläubig auf Jae. Dann sieht sie dich an.{/n} "Ich nehme an, Ihr unterstützt sie? In diesem Fall müsst Ihr einen schriftlichen Antrag mit dem Formular #404.01 einreichen. Zudem eine persönliche Freigabe für die Verarbeitung und Beglaubigung der persönlichen Daten Eurer heiligen Person. Anderenfalls kann ich Herrin ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers over her ocular lenses at Jae in disbelief. Then she looks at you.{/n} "I take it you are her sponsor? In that case, you must submit a written application in conformity with template #404.01. As well as written permission for the processing and notarisation of the personal data of your most sacred personage. Without it, I cannot issue Mistress..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Meisterin der Siegel blickt über ihre Linsen hinweg ungläubig auf Jae. Dann sieht sie dich an.{/n} "Ich nehme an, Ihr unterstützt sie? In diesem Fall müsst Ihr einen schriftlichen Antrag mit dem Formular #404.01 einreichen. Zudem eine persönliche Freigabe für die Verarbeitung und Beglaubigung der persönlichen Daten Eurer heiligen Person. Anderenfalls kann ich Herrin ..."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: {n}Mühür Üstadı, gördüklerine inanamazmışçasına oküler merceklerini indirip gözlerini kısarak Jae'a bakıyor. Ardından da bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum ki hanımefendiye siz kefil oluyorsunuz? O hâlde 404,01 sayılı şablona uygun yazılı bir başvuruda bulunmanız gerekiyor. Buna ilaveten, pek kutsal şahsiyetinizin kişisel verilerinin işlenip notere onaylatılması için yazılı bir izin de gerekiyor. Bu olmaksızın Üstat..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Master of Seals peers over her ocular lenses at Jae in disbelief. Then she looks at you.{/n} "I take it you are her sponsor? In that case, you must submit a written application in conformity with template #404.01. As well as written permission for the processing and notarisation of the personal data of your most sacred personage. Without it, I cannot issue Mistress..."

Ardından da bakışlarını sana çeviriyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum ki hanımefendiye siz kefil oluyorsunuz? O hâlde 404,01 numaralı şablona uygun yazılı bir başvuruda bulunmanız gerekiyor. Buna ilaveten, pek kutsal şahsiyetinizin kişisel verilerinin işlenip notere onaylatılması için yazılı bir izin de gerekiyor. Bu olmaksızın Üstat..."
